content: Use MCP servers connected by the administrator to enhance chat experience with AI. MCP servers can assist with data extraction, summaries, smart suggestions, etc.

comment.text: This text describes the functionality of MCP servers, explaining they enhance the chat experience with AI features like data extraction and suggestions. It appears as a description within the Create/Edit Agent dialog, specifically near controls for MCP server selection. Translators should convey that these servers provide AI-powered assistance.
